summary: A former vaudevillian gifted at impersonation assists a mad scientist in reanimating corpses and soon goes mad himself.
cast: Bill Woods|Horace B. Carpenter|Ted Edwards|Phyllis Diller|Thea Ramsey|Jenny Dark|Marvelle Andre|Celia McCann|John P. Wade|Marian Constance Blackton|Umberto Guarracino|Bartolomeo Pagano|Satan
title: Maniac
